name: S'mores Bars with Graham Crackers
author: Nathan C
summary: These layered s'mores bars are a great alternative to grilled s'mores if you don't have a campfire present.
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Mix graham cracker crumbs and sugar together in a bowl
Add melted butter and toss until combined
Press mixture into the bottom of a 9x13-inch baking pan in an even layer
Spread chocolate chips evenly over the graham cracker mixture
Lay 7 graham crackers evenly into the pan, then pour the mini marshmallows on top of the graham crackers in an even layer
Lay remaining graham crackers over marshmallows, then drizzle chocolate syrup on top
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes
Let cool at least 30 minutes before cutting and serving
